name: Cryptids
author: ShadowGov Team
description: X-Files deluxe parody. 300 cards. Government vs Truth.

cards.name: Men in Black Sweep
cards.text: Opponent loses 7 IP. If Truth > 60%, lose 10 instead.

cards.name: Weather Machine Alpha
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Project Grand Mandela
cards.text: Set Truth to 15%. Opponent skips next Action. Draw 1.
cards.flavor: Remember when you thought you remembered?

cards.name: Chemtrail Deployment
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target state. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Area 51 Security
cards.text: Immune to next MEDIA card. Gain 2 IP.

cards.name: Fake Alien Invasion
cards.flavor: War of the Worlds 2: Electric Boogaloo

cards.name: Disinformation Bureau
cards.text: All MEDIA cards cost 1 less. Truth -10%.
cards.flavor: Truth is whatever we say it is.

cards.name: Bigfoot Suit Factory
cards.text: Truth -12%. Next ZONE card costs 2 less.

cards.name: Mothman Relocation Program
cards.text: Add 5 Pressure to target state. Truth -8%.

cards.name: Lake Monster Drainage
cards.flavor: Just a big log. Really big log.

cards.name: Deniability Protocols
cards.flavor: We have no knowledge of these protocols.

cards.name: Black Helicopters
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Truth -6%.

cards.name: Operation SMIRK
cards.text: Opponent loses 8 IP and discards 1 card.

cards.name: Cryptozoology Department
cards.text: ZONE cards cost 1 less. Gain 2 IP.

cards.name: Flatwoods Incident
cards.flavor: Just a barn owl in a tree.

cards.name: Hopkinsville Goblins
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Time Travel Bureau
cards.text: Take another turn after this one.

cards.name: Interdimensional Gate
cards.text: Shuffle opponent's hand into deck. Draw 2.

cards.name: Yeti Expedition Hoax
cards.flavor: Bear tracks in snow. Always bears.

cards.name: Skinwalker Ranch Buyout
cards.text: Add 5 Pressure to target state. Draw 1.

cards.name: Washington Sea Serpent
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target state. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Psychic Spying Program
cards.text: Look at opponent's hand. Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Invisible Aircraft Project
cards.text: Immune to ATTACK cards this turn. Truth -12%.

cards.name: Greys Employment Program
cards.text: TECH cards cost 1 less. Gain 3 IP.

cards.name: Reality Anchor Array
cards.text: Truth cannot go above 50% this turn.

cards.name: Neuralyzer Deployment
cards.text: Opponent returns hand to deck and draws 3 new cards.

cards.name: Shadow Government HQ
cards.text: Draw 1 extra card each turn. Truth -10%.

cards.name: Operation Paperclip II
cards.text: Copy opponent's last played card effect.

cards.name: Extraterrestrial Non-Disclosure Treaty
cards.text: Immune to MEDIA cards for 2 turns.

cards.name: Quantum Bigfoot Experiment
cards.text: Play 2 cards this turn instead of 1.

cards.name: Interdimensional Customs
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure. Opponent pays 2 IP to play cards next turn.

cards.name: Cosmic Horror Containment
cards.text: Block all opponent cards this turn. Lose 5 IP.
cards.flavor: Some things are worth not knowing.

cards.name: Reptilian Shapeshifter Agent
cards.text: Opponent loses 6 IP. Copy their next card.
cards.flavor: Trust no one. Especially not yourself.

cards.name: Psy-Ops Division
cards.text: Opponent loses 5 IP. Next card costs 3 more.

cards.name: Cryptid Witness Protection
cards.flavor: New identity, new life, old secrets.

cards.name: Anomalous Materials Division
cards.text: All cards have +1 effect power. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Phantom Helicopter Squadron
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure. Next turn gain +2 IP.

cards.name: Reality Distortion Field
cards.text: All opponent cards do nothing this turn.
cards.flavor: What you see is what we want.

cards.name: Cryptid DNA Database
cards.text: Draw cards equal to states controlled. Truth -8%.

cards.name: Consciousness Transfer Lab
cards.text: Steal opponent's next card before they play it.

cards.name: Multidimensional Embassy
cards.text: Gain income from opponent's controlled states too.

cards.name: Ultra Disclosure Protocol
cards.text: Truth +25%. If you control D.C., +35% instead. AI loses 10 IP.
cards.flavor: The truth will set you free... eventually.

cards.name: Bigfoot Expedition
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target state. Truth +5%.
cards.flavor: Trail cam footage: inconclusive but promising.

cards.name: Alien Abduction Support Group
cards.flavor: You're not crazy. We have the scars to prove it.

cards.name: Mothman Prophecies
cards.flavor: The bridge collapse was just the beginning.

cards.name: Chupacabra Sighting Report
cards.text: Add 2 Pressure to target state. Truth +5%.

cards.name: Lake Monster Sonar Evidence
cards.flavor: That's no log. Logs don't have teeth.

cards.name: Area 51 Infiltration
cards.text: Opponent loses 8 IP. Truth +15%. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Skunk Ape Footage
cards.flavor: Blurry, but that's definitely not a bear.

cards.name: Fouke Monster Evidence
cards.flavor: Arkansas Bigfoot is real and angry.

cards.name: Thunderbird Sightings Database
cards.text: Truth +15%. All ZONE cards cost 1 less.
cards.flavor: Giant eagles are making a comeback.

cards.name: Lizard People Exposé
cards.flavor: Look closely at their eyes in photos.

cards.name: UFO Crash Retrieval Team
cards.text: Opponent loses 6 IP. Gain alien technology token.

cards.name: Interdimensional Portal Research
cards.text: Draw cards from both players' decks.

cards.name: Yeti Hair Analysis
cards.flavor: DNA doesn't match any known species.

cards.name: Skinwalker Ranch Investigation
cards.flavor: Something's very wrong with this place.

cards.name: Dover Demon Witness Testimony
cards.flavor: Three teenagers, same story, 40 years later.

cards.name: Real Alien Autopsy Leak
cards.flavor: The fake was covering the real one.

cards.name: Beast of Bladenboro Hunt
cards.flavor: Vampire cat confirmed in North Carolina.

cards.name: Washington Sea Serpent Sonar
cards.text: Truth +10%. Add 2 Pressure to coastal states.

cards.name: Invisible Aircraft Photos
cards.text: Opponent cannot play TECH cards next turn. Truth +12%.

cards.name: Grey Alien Eyewitness Testimony
cards.flavor: They're here, and they're not tourists.

cards.name: Paranormal Investigation Society
cards.text: MEDIA cards give +5% Truth. Gain 2 IP.

cards.name: Dimension X Refugees
cards.flavor: They fled here for a reason.

cards.name: Cryptid Sanctuary Network
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure. Protected from TECH cards.

cards.name: Alien Implant Removal Clinic
cards.text: Remove all opponent status effects. Truth +12%.

cards.name: Consciousness Expansion Workshop
cards.text: Truth +20%. All cards cost 1 less next turn.

cards.name: Multidimensional Gateway
cards.text: Gain cards from opponent's deck. Truth +15%.

cards.name: Moon Landing Hoax Evidence
cards.flavor: Waving flag in vacuum, case closed.

cards.name: Memory Recovery Session
cards.flavor: Remembering what they made you forget.

cards.name: Shadow Government Infiltration
cards.flavor: We have people on the inside now.

cards.name: Holographic Universe Theory
cards.text: Reality becomes malleable. Next 3 cards cost 0.

cards.name: Phantom Satellite Tracking
cards.text: See all opponent cards for 3 turns. Truth +8%.

cards.name: Consciousness Upload Technology
cards.text: Gain opponent's last played card permanently.

cards.name: Crystal Wi-Fi Chakra Network
cards.text: All cards give +3% Truth. Gain 2 IP per turn.

cards.name: Tinfoil Hat Manufacturing
cards.text: Immune to MEDIA cards for 2 turns.

cards.name: Late Night AM Radio
cards.flavor: Coast to Coast, the truth is out there.

cards.name: Mothman Omen Network
cards.text: Opponent loses 6 IP. Predict their next card.

cards.name: Whistleblower Protection Network
cards.text: Immune to opponent effects for 2 turns. Truth +8%.

cards.name: Flat Earth Conference
cards.flavor: Globe manufacturers hate this one trick.

cards.name: Chemtrail Detection Kit
cards.flavor: Aluminum oxide levels: OFF THE CHARTS.
